title: Stereoscopic Views, "Thirty-Six Selected Haynes Stereoscopic Views of the Yellowstone National Park", 1881–88
medium: Albumen silver print mounted on cream paperboard
dimensions:
Overall: 18.4 x 9.5 x 5.1 cm (7 1/4 x 3 3/4 x 2 in.)
Each card: 8.9 x 17.7 cm (3 1/2  x 7 in.)
Each photograph mounted side by side: 8 x 7.5 cm (3 3/16 x 3 in.)
creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard P. Wunder
description: Red paper laminate (cardboard) box with removable top, with printed black text on brown paper front, back and top. Contents: 36 stereoviews (albumen silver prints) of the major scenic views of Yellowstone Park mounted on cream cardboard.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Stereoscopic Views, "Thirty-Six Selected Haynes Stereoscopic Views of the Yellowstone National Park", 1881–88.
1881–88. Albumen silver print mounted on cream paperboard. Gift of Dr. Richard P. Wunder. 1962-156-1-1/38.
